snippet.title: Haunted Memories: The Return || Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Haunted Memories: The Return on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2441310/Haunted_Memories_The_Return/

Unravel the mystery of Green Park.
Experience a realistic survival horror game that offers a first-person body cam perspective. 
Collect all the evidence you can - files, voice recordings, videotapes, and photographs. Connect the dots and get to the bottom of a mystery that is as frightening as it is real.

The terror will protect its secrets.
Try to survive from intimate crime scenes to historical monuments to death, there will be a grain of truth hidden everywhere. 

Don't draw too much attention, or you will regret it...

------------------------
